divs: sighting detailscontained within the major motion picture jaws. video tape, counter #137.50 continuation of scene where shark attacks boat after song 'show me the way to go home'. character quinn is reaching into bag to grab a revolver with night sky in background overhead. unidentified light enters top of frame from right then travels to left at extreme velocity in sky overhead. the light holds a blurred roundish shape trailing an unmistakable contrail of luminous rainbow colors. next frame. tape counter #138.04 transition scene of boat on water. similar light enters frame at top left, accelerates at high velocity and disappears in clouds far into the frame within seconds also leaving a clear unmistakable contrail of luminous rainbow colors. appears to gain altitude and velocity as it disappears. these are the two most dramatic and easily viewable\verifiable sightings within the film but if a viewer looks closely they can see many other, unclear, blurry, and difficult to see, lights if they slow down the film and concentrate on what first appear to be film\development imperfections. examples of very quick and suspect sightings (possible imperfections) within the film. counter #126.05 not long after the lines from characters cooper with reply by quinn. cooper: "that's a twenty footer." quinn: "twenty five." contained in background sky with non-speaking character quinn in the foreground with his back turned. most of frame is blue day sky. numerous, undefinable things become visible within this frame if slowed down but just as quickly disappear. the slowed down images may be common imperfections in filming or development. i found these only after noticing the other unidentifiable objects later already described then slowed down all oddities or imperfections to determine their origin. one blurred slowed down shot appears to be a static object that reverses field and travels out of frame in less than a fraction of a second however it was extremely blurry and impossible to clarify. i thought i could have had a poor copy of the film but have seen this in other copies then recently saw the same unidentified objects within the film jaws on a cable broadcast. the two clearly visible high velocity traveling lights were clearly visible at normal speed in the public broadcast as they are in all copies that i have seen of the film. i conducted an internet search to check if this had been reported and had been explained yet found no mention of this anywhere. strangely enough in my search i could not help notice that spielberg's next film was close encounters which may have been a harmless coincidence. i have shown the film down to others and they have verified this and have been similarly surprised. this seems too common and ubiquitous to have been hidden in clear site so their may be some easy explanation but i found it worth passing along since its very easy to pick up a copy of the film and you should be able to easily find the two very clear examples i've relayed. regards, robert fergus
Summary: Numerous sightings are clearly evident within background of film Jaws
